description: Temporary Help Services Request for Proposal
full_summary:
# Notice for Request for Proposal: Business Administration Services
## Notice Information

* **Notice Number**: cb-289-13113317
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-24-CY13
* **Publication Date**: 2024-01-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-19T13:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Expiré

## Contract Information

* **Contract Title**: ITI in Support of C2 THS
* **Contract Duration**: January 29, 2024, to December 23, 2024
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of National Defence
* **Delivery Location**: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

## Tendering Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements**: All applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Melissa Lee
* **Contact E-mail**: desproc6-dose6@forces.gc.ca

## Tender Documents

* **English Version**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29149/w6369-24-cy13_-_iti_ths_npp_english.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29149/w6369-24-cy13_-_iti_ths_npp_english.pdf)
* **French Version**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29149/w6369-24-cy13_-_iti_ths_npp_french.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29149/w6369-24-cy13_-_iti_ths_npp_french.pdf)

## Proposal Submission

* The Department of National Defence invites suppliers to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services. 
* The proposal submission deadline is January 19, 2024, at 13:00:00.
* Interested suppliers are required to review the tender documents in their entirety and
